value:
Ah, good day to you! Perchance,
have you seen Prince Marth
anywhere?

Though I am a princess, my home,
Talys, is but an island kingdom.
So my standing isn't all that grand.

You always seem so busy—please
let me know if there's any way I
can be of assistance.

We may have so many enemies
today, but I'm sure that given half a
chance? They'll become allies.

I've just finished making a stew.
Would you like to try some while
it's hot?

Do you know who speaks very well
of you—and bid me to greet you?
It was $Nf!

I can feel myself growing
stronger!

Ah! I can now be of greater
assistance.

I'm sorry. It seems I'm not
performing well today...

I will use this new power to help
everyone.

I am Princess Caeda of Talys.
I'm also a pegasus knight, though
perhaps an unconventional one.

Your strength has always impressed
me. I've always felt weak, needing
protection from others.$k$pI was envious of your strength,
but I think I've got it figured out
now...$k$pYour strength comes from your
belief in your allies. My "weakness"
could be your strength.$k$pI would like to stay with you longer
and learn more from you and your
strength, if that's OK.$k$pHeehee! I appreciate it. I look
forward to observing you right
up close...
はいっ！
えいっ！
きゃああっ！
I won't...lose...
Throw down your weapon!
Please, clear the way!
I'll do my part!
I don't want to hurt you!
Too weak...
Heehee
What's the matter? Can I help?
Ahh! Don't startle me like that!
You seem to be a very kindhearted person.
Tell me—do you believe in love?
I'm so glad we have a chance to talk! It's always a pleasure.
Would you consider me a "tomboy"?
Let us fight side by side forever.
Certainly.
What next?
Let's go.
